website_summaries.verdict: A good-looking wallet by a popular brand that has both some nice features and some quality issues.
pros: A classic bifold style wallet by a popular name in men's fashions
Made of real leather with the brand logo on the front
Has a handy removable pass case
cons: It's a bit stiff, which makes putting cards in and removing them difficult, plus some of the card slots seem small

customer_reviews.title: Read review! You have been warned!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this wallet due to its claim that it was a slim fit wallet and I did alot of research into it and it seemed to be good however there are alot of problems with this wallet. Firtly the actual card slots are so small that they barely fit an actual card. I have five bills, five cards and one ID in there and it literally sticks up about 5 inches. My trifold wallet that I had previously I had 10 cards, four ids, a law enforcement badge and several business cards and it only stuck up three inches. Very disappointed in this product. I'd highly recommend looking elsewhere and to take this review to heart.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle W.

customer_reviews.title: Great choice for for those who carry alot of cards.
customer_reviews.text: I love this wallet so far. I love the fact that the billfold is double lined to separate amounts if you have to. The material smells and feels of authentic hide leather. Like real leather it takes some wear to "break it in" and give it flexibility. Because the shape of the wallet seems to be almost a perfect square and the credit card slots are stacked offset, even with this wallet filled with 20 individual bills and every credit card slot full , also with the pass case still in; This wallet is still comfortable to sit on without you hurting your butt cheek.
customer_reviews.author: DeonteJ

customer_reviews.title: Decent Wallet In Quality And Price
customer_reviews.text: After my search for a new wallet, and finding some I really likes, but hated the $150+ price tag, I decided to buy another Tommy Hilfiger. The first one lasted almost 20 years. It was still in really good condition, but the ID card holder was starting tear at the corner, so I figured I’d buy new one. The new one seems to be made just as well in regard to stitching and material; it has an all leather outer shell, and is exactly as described. I really like it. If you looking for a decent men’s wallet, but do not want to spend a lot of money, give this one a try.
customer_reviews.author: TKTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Quality
customer_reviews.text: I have experienced the same issues as others that have posted pictures. As you can see in my pic, the leather is wearing and fading. Bought it 12/2018, and it is now 02/2019. Missed the return window when I noticed the wearing/fading. Nice looking wallet, but I wouldn’t waste the cash on this one. Tommy Hilfiger dropped the ball in terms of quality.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron G.

customer_reviews.title: Lasted me 11 months
customer_reviews.text: Went online to order a new wallet today, and searched my orders to see how long ago it was that I ordered this Tommy Hilfiger one. I purchased it in November 2018. So it lasted 11 months. I'm in my mid 40s and not very rough on my wallets. This has to be one of the shorter life span wallets I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Edwards

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed from this items , its too much poor quality i received it before 10 days and after 10 days the color changed finally its now like this image i attached , please if any one from customer service can contact with me ( this image after 10 days using )
customer_reviews.author: Peter Fakhry

customer_reviews.title: A quality product
customer_reviews.text: You pay a bit more for quality but it is totally worth it. It's a really nice leather wallet and the cost won't break the bank. Definitely worth owning IMO but I wouldn't recommend it if you like to keep your wallet a ton of things in your wallet. You would be better off getting a bigger wallet if that is the case, If not then this one will work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Haywood

customer_reviews.title: Good one, I liked it!
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my previous 6 years old Tommy's leather wallet with this product. It satisfied my preference, b I don't like bulky wallets. I removed the ID holder separately, so I can use just one ID and a cc with me when I go for a jog, or short errands. I keep very minimal items inside wallet so it won't be bulky but this is capable of holding many items. At very beginning we will feel it's bit thick and bulky but once we start using it, it comes to normal size which is good else You can keep it under a big book for a night to shrink it. :p Hopefully this also stands for three years at least.
customer_reviews.author: Ranyu87

customer_reviews.title: High quality, beautifully made wallet
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my kid, and was very impressed with the quality & thickness of the leather. Very well made, and an authentic TF product. It came in an imprinted leather box that is reusable as a wallet tray. Nice little bit of luxury.
customer_reviews.author: Yves

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for my boyfriend
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my boyfriend, and he loved it! It fits all the gift cards he had (around 5) and his credit card and ID too. The wallet stays relatively flat even with all those cards inside of it. With the brand name, I think it is a decently priced wallet. I think this is an easy gift for any men in your life!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Great for 3 years.
customer_reviews.text: The person I bought this wallet for loved it, and has this as his everyday use. After about 3 years of everyday use the inside section for coins ripped, and the logo fell off. The wallet is still being used as it's still allows him to carry the regular stuff such as cards, paper notes, etc.
customer_reviews.author: NirElla

customer_reviews.title: Good size, handy storage, well made.
customer_reviews.text: The wallet is well designed and made, with lots of storage for credit cards, licenses, etc. The only criticism I have is that the outside is slippery, possibly making it prone to loss or theft.
customer_reviews.author: eselar

customer_reviews.title: Valentine’s Day gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a Valentine’s Day gift for my boyfriend and he loves it! When he opened it, he said ‘You didn’t have to spend so much!’ Little does he know how affordable it was. Great quality, beautiful leather and relatively slim with all the stuff her carries in it.
customer_reviews.author: Hilda E.

customer_reviews.title: I love this wallet
customer_reviews.text: very pretty and elegant, everyone who shows it likes me. It is made of genuine leather and looks very durable. I recommend it with my eyes closed. it would be a great gift
customer_reviews.author: Miguel j.

customer_reviews.title: Not great finishing
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this as a gift but it was really poor quality. Ends were very rough wasn’t smooth. Price was good but I didn’t think finishing would be so bad. Had to return this and get something else.
customer_reviews.author: Aashish

customer_reviews.title: the worst purchase
customer_reviews.text: I paid 21.99 more taxes and I got a wallet that looks like a poorly made replica, the logo where hilfiger says the last letters are not well printed and do not notice very well, the worst thing is not only that, it's that I'm from Peru and they tell me they can not do anything, I demand that they give me back my money !! or send me a product well done, not anything.
customer_reviews.author: Pilar Díaz Pachas

customer_reviews.title: Do not listen to the negative reviews
customer_reviews.text: So I have had this wallet for about 6 months now and I gotta say, this is by far, the best wallet I have purchased. It is made of high quality leather, it is spacious, and it does not wear quickly like some wallets I've owned in the past. I can honestly say that there are no flaws in this design. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Gman0706

customer_reviews.title: For this to be a name brand item, I ...
customer_reviews.text: For this to be a name brand item, I did not expect to see the item damaged in two places. It is not enough for me to go through trouble and send back BUT I think the item should have been 100% up to par. I did read over feedback and saw this item went to others in same condition but I thought it was a long time thing...but it may be a pattern. Look at my attached pictures. Damage on the bottom and damage on right side, 2nd flap down on the left. Thank you,
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Good Wallet
customer_reviews.text: came on time.... nice colour. description / photos accurate. Just wish there was one extra pocket to hold another card. but overall very good.
customer_reviews.author: MyView

customer_reviews.title: Only Wallet You'll Ever Need
customer_reviews.text: After 9 months of owning this wallet i must say it is an absolute STEAL for the low price. Quality is unmatched and after 9 months of using it every single day it still looks and feels the same as the first day I unboxed it. I highly recommend it. The brown leather not only looks but also feels premium and high quality. You would think I spent $100 plus on it. Lots of room to fit all your stuff. Its the only wallet you'll ever need.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is the best wallet I have ever bought. I will buy it again because it is worth the price. It feels nice, the leather seems resistible not as some other wallets that will tear apart within the first week. The case that it came with was very fancy. I would also suggest that this wallet would be a good present for a loved one.
customer_reviews.author: B. M.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The wallet obviously looks great, I've had it for a while now. I saw some reviews talking about how theirs is falling apart but I have to say that they are definitely not handling their wallet normally, to say the least... Because mine is still in great shape, I also like how my ID is held in its own little holder separate from my cards. I recommend getting this if you want a new wallet or someone you know has an old wallet. An excellent gift and well worth your money.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Love the color and brand, just a little too small
customer_reviews.text: Red is one of my favorite colors, so I chose the wallet for its color and the brands name. I like Tommy Hilfiger products. Anyway, nice wallet. Keeps everything safely secure and tight. However, the wallet seems to not have much space for a large amount of paper bills. I literally have to have 10’s, 20’s, 50’s and 100’s, or just have $40.00 in my wallet and $1,000 loaded on my debit card. Would I recommend this product to an associate or colleague, yes. Despite the cons and all, I still love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. D. Green

customer_reviews.title: Practical and Aesthetically Pleasing
customer_reviews.text: This wallet was the first purchase I made after a wallet I had for a year finally started to tear. I have this wallet stuffed and still see no signs of it stretching or tearing. I love Tommy branded items and initially bought this for that reason, but it has been durable and practical as well.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Well-made Tommy Wallet
customer_reviews.text: This wallet is from Tommy Hilfiger and is very well made and designed. I love how many pockets it has for my credit cards. It's stylish and affordable. It's also not too bulky and fits well in pockets. I would recommend buying this for yourself or as a gift for someone wanting a wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine S.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my boyfriend, I checked it out of course when it came and it’s really nice, feels nice and not too bulky plenty room for his cash and cards!
customer_reviews.author: Jadyn Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Too small, stiff leather
customer_reviews.text: The insert on the left with the clear plastic meant for holding IDs is too small to hold my drivers license so I had to just remove it. The card slots are also very tight and barely allow for credit cards and such to fit in. The left panel is now not that useful as I had to put items in a hidden slot that wasn't meant to hold things directly. I'm using it for now and hoping it stretches but the design and dimensions do not make for a very functional or useful wallet. I might go back to my old one. I'd almost lean towards a 2 star on this.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: It feels and looks really nice. The color looks just as pictured
customer_reviews.text: It feels and looks really nice. The color looks just as pictured, if you are worried about getting a different colored brown than pictured. It's my first wallet ever. Comes in a really nice box that I won't throw away, it looks nice enough to keep in my bedroom. The box is made of some leather, plastic, and suede. As far as shipping goes, I ordered for next day shipping by 9PM guaranteed and got it at 8PM so good shipping. Overall great buy, I recommend it you are looking for a classy looking leather wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Kev

customer_reviews.title: A good quality value.
customer_reviews.text: A nice wallet. Looks good. Nice size. Has all the features I need. The leather is not polished. Therefore not slick. Will stay in your pocket easily.
customer_reviews.author: Ken in The Villages

customer_reviews.title: The Hilfiger Name has been slurred by the quality of this wallet
customer_reviews.text: I immediately returned it upon arrival. Not the quality I expected with the Hilfiger name on it. I could see the list price was inflated so the selling prive looked like a bargain. No way, Jose. Again, you get what you pay for, and the price was just too low to support quality workmanship. It appears one company is making the same wallet and just putting different designer logo names on them. Stay away from this one.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Loved it.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband, he’s like a quality check officer in his head😅. I was wondering whether He’ll like it, but the quality is really good. My hubby loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Nirmala

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and perfect space
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my older brother's birthday. He totally loved it. Great quality. Plenty space. Beautiful design. It was the perfect gift for him!!! Will buy again for dad :)
customer_reviews.author: JuJu Bean

customer_reviews.title: The quality is very good but the rest leaves a lot to be desired
customer_reviews.text: It is very small, the bills stand out, some documents such as driver's license does not enter the card holder, it does not have a purse. The quality is very good but the rest leaves a lot to be desired. I could not recomend it. I do not return it because I would lose more money doing it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Wallet
customer_reviews.text: Nice wallet, premium for the price. Also, the packaging has a nice bottom that I have been using for change and to hold the wallet!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan M.

customer_reviews.title: Initial impression: very positive.
customer_reviews.text: This looks like a great wallet. Initial impressions are very positive. Credit card slots are a little tight, but this is true of any wallet I have ever purchased, and they do get better over time. I double up all my plastic cards in these slots, and I had no problem doing so here. The workmanship on this item appears to be very good, especially so considering the price. In summary, I would recommend this item
customer_reviews.author: A.C

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet
customer_reviews.text: This a wonderful wallet with more than enough slots to place credit cards and other necessary items. It comes with a detached card holder with clear plastic envelopes that work beautifully as the space you would want to put your driver's license. There are only two cons. First, space for your dollar bills is pinched tightly on the right and left sides where the stitching a are. This makes it a little difficult to slide paper money into. Lastly, the wallet may not close fully when the card slots are filled. This is mainly knit picking and not a deal breaker at all. Overall, this a recommended but if you want a nice wallet to replace an older one.
customer_reviews.author: TheGoodShepard

customer_reviews.title: Seems of great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Gifted this to my husband 3 months ago and it's still brand new. I can't believe how cheap this was.
customer_reviews.author: Fernanda Sana

customer_reviews.title: Great quality wallet
customer_reviews.text: Great sleek looking wallet. It's a very clean leather wallet, the color is exactly as expected and the size of the wallet is exactly as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Scottie B.

customer_reviews.title: Out of the box review: I absolutely love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: First Impressions of this wallet are great. It feels amazing, and has tons of room for Cards and all the crazy things I put in my wallet. This is a classy wallet, it looks and is made out of amazing material. Feels way more authentic then anything I have had in the past (which isn't very good wallets) I see myself using this for the next few years until It falls apart! I will update you on how it holds up a few months from now from every day wear and tear. That will be the ultimate test.
customer_reviews.author: mark hix

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift ! Got one for my boyfriend! Good product
customer_reviews.author: Jensen esser

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: This is the best wallet by far. I bought my husband one exactly like this one about 8-9 years ago and I finally had to order another about 2 weeks ago. He wears out wallets so it is well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: SAM

customer_reviews.title: A great purchase for the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wallet for my 19 year old son for his birthday he loved it it's a great little wallet it holds cards pictures and cash the only thing is it doesn't have an area to hold change that's the only downfall of this wallet I bought the color brown and it's a really nice color. I do recommend this wallet and I would buy it for someone else in my family.
customer_reviews.author: tamara ziuraitis

customer_reviews.title: Like the Wallet
customer_reviews.text: I just received it and I know I'm going to like this wallet. Looks really nice and has plenty of storage areas for me. I really like the "just flip the ID holder" on this wallet...very convenient! It's a little stiff when new like most wallets, but should break in fine with some use. I had bought a Nautica tri-fold wallet from this site about two months ago and already like this one better. I guess a flip passcase billfold wallet is the way to go for me. And Tommy Hilfiger makes a nice one.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as it seems
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered Tommy Hilfiger Men's Casual Wallet as a gift and i'm too confused. Firstly, it comes with the original box and all the documents, which seems really nice; But... but... didn't like quality
customer_reviews.author: Nigo

customer_reviews.title: Wallet with Options
customer_reviews.text: Has protection from electronic stealing of credit card info. Removable ID badge. Place for photos. Only thing lacking is a divided bill compartment.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Gary

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but I sent it back for a ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, but I sent it back for a different one. It is quite thick and there is not enough room for credit cards/ID. Look at this wallet, it is much better.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy, it's not 100% leather, the seams are ripping easy, may be fake.
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap quality, it's defiantly not 100% leather, the inside ripped while taking tag of, returning the wallet, it only has room for 3 credit cards and it gets very thick.
customer_reviews.author: Fadi

customer_reviews.title: Great Wallet
customer_reviews.text: Love this wallet. It looks great and very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: FANCY
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my boyfriend as a valentine's day present, he loves it! It came in a nice valet box, the leather is very soft and the wallet is in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Tiara R.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for the past 5 years and I honestly don't see myself buying anything else anytime soon. This thing is amazing to last this long with everyday use and to still look good.
customer_reviews.author: Maxx

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Wallet arrived and it looked nicer than the image. The leather is very clean and elligant looking. The waller has multiple compartments including a dettachable section. My husband loves it and used the detachable section to take to work so he wont carry a huge wallet. Great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: I like the little sleeve that comes with the wallet a ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the little sleeve that comes with the wallet a lot. I carry it with me instead of the bigger wallet since I now pay almost everything with my Samsung Pay and the sleeve serves as a backup where I put my cards. The freedom of simplicity and lightweight!
customer_reviews.author: Karl Norden

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous good quality leather
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his new wallet. Size is perfect for pant pocket. Would buy again! Thank you 😊
customer_reviews.author: Karen Fiorillo

customer_reviews.title: If I could give half ratings it is a strong 4.5 for me
customer_reviews.text: Love it looks clean and professional. I’ve had it for a few weeks now and it’s still holding up. I guess my only gripe would be that it is pretty difficult to get my if out of that little slot. But over the product is wonderful. ( atm some pictures are incorrect as on the left side of the wallet there is a large pocket that you can put the id holder(which has two cardholder slots on it) inside of). Overall nice product
customer_reviews.author: Barnabas Malawi Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Gift for my husband!
customer_reviews.text: He likes it; slim but a normal wallet; not just a glorified money clip. Good price and quality.
customer_reviews.author: llb

customer_reviews.title: Great Tommy Hilfiger wallet
customer_reviews.text: Great wallet , it has many compartments for your credit cards , identity and driving liscence Very well made and the leather feels great in it plus it looks stylish and classy Recommended
customer_reviews.author: Mona MAURICE Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect wallet!
customer_reviews.text: It’s looks good and comfortable, also the case it’s in perfect condition!
customer_reviews.author: Anderson Carrasco

customer_reviews.title: Made a great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Item as described! Made a great gift! Thanks so much!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Linnell

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: Im a tough cookie when it comes to wallets, i have yet to have found the perfect one after time and time again. the leather is nice, i like that the pockets arnt so tight i cant pull out my cards, the id card holder fits my license and student id separately (it's kinda hard to describe), whats more the deal. a $40 wallet for $20, im all about it. there's two money compartments, i just use one of them for cash the other for checks. great wallet and highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: jessie

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: excellent quality , a little large for what I was wanting, giving it as a gift now
customer_reviews.author: lester tharp

customer_reviews.title: Great Wallet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wallet since i need something to carry my money around in. i bought this one because it seemed to by the nicer one out of the two Tommy Hilfiger wallets i was looking at. With the id clip and the blank folder holders all in pocket of the wallet, it still remains skinny and not too bulky. the leather feels legit and even says genuine leather on the inside. its a great wallet and the label is quite fashionable. buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Zeg 1313

customer_reviews.title: Already Falling Apart
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this wallet about 3 months ago and have used it like any other wallet, but it is already falling apart. The threading is coming off and I'll soon have to order another. I wouldn't recommend this product for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Craft

customer_reviews.title: So far ... so good
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a replacement for my father’s other wallet... so far so good
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my brother in law for Christmas as it was on his wishlist. He loved it! :) Came in a nice strong sturdy giftbox case too that had the logo on it.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy H.

customer_reviews.title: Very Spacious
customer_reviews.text: Very stylish wallet with lots of room for credit cards and ID's. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: P.M.D.

customer_reviews.title: Nice looks
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't have the same space my tri-fold wallet had, but it's still a nice wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Mike T.

customer_reviews.title: Wallet was not flexible when cards or bills were inserted
customer_reviews.text: My rating is based on the fact that when the credit cards were in, the wallet would not close enough to put it in your pocket. I had to use a rubber band to hold the halves together. The bill compartment was stiff and difficult to get the bills in and out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Most beautiful wallet I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: It's incredible. It's very soft, very red, has just the right amount of pockets. I like that I can remove two of them to show my is and insurance card
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my step son for his Birthday. Love it great material looks like it will last along time .
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Love the wallet
customer_reviews.text: Love the wallet! Im not a real fan of Tommy Hilfigar :/ but this wallet is nice and sleek. The leather is smooth and clean, and the price is good too. The presentation was good it came in a nice box. The detacable inner pocket makes it really bulky and it makes it hard to sit so i took it out its really not needed if you dont have a lot of cards. Great wallet and its not big fits in back pocket perfect.
customer_reviews.author: teejay

customer_reviews.title: Not as shown.
customer_reviews.text: This product is not as it is pictured. We specifically bought this because it had the plastic sleeves in addition to the slots in the wallet itself. When it arrived - no plastic sleeves.
customer_reviews.author: Karen T

customer_reviews.title: A wallet says it all
customer_reviews.text: A great way to customize your look and style having such a great quality stylish wallet with excellent character. I’m overly impressed and leaving a great impression
customer_reviews.author: XavierKGJ

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Good buy, sturdy , and fits in any pockets , plus cards, cash and Id cards fits comfortably Inside.
customer_reviews.author: Bonito

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is a durable wallet. It came just as described!
customer_reviews.author: Felicia Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: The wallet looks good. The box containing the wallet is also good.
customer_reviews.author: A customer

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this gift for a friend and he loved it! Would buy again for my brother if he needed it:)
customer_reviews.author: Telly

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Wallet
customer_reviews.text: I am sure those I give these wallets to will like them very much!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Great, SMALL AND COMPACT
customer_reviews.text: I love this leather wallet as it is affordable, small in size ( can put it in my back pocket and my ass won't hurt while sitting) and great looking. Recommending to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Sandro

customer_reviews.title: Okay for a young man... not so ...
customer_reviews.text: Okay for a young man... not so much for adult. Its main trouble is not enough credit card slots. I have looked elsewhere now and have found wallets with 12 card slots for less cost. Might send this back .. not sure yet.
customer_reviews.author: Brian - Kansas CityTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: I got this to replace one that I lost. ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace one that I lost. Even though it looks the same as the one I lost in the picture, this one is much bigger, and it doesn't have the window for my ID. It's too big and bulky for my pockets. Unfortunately, I just pulled out the insert and am using that as my wallet instead.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice and elegant wallet
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my boyfriend and he really likes it. It is elegant and he loves the blue color. Is a very nice gift and with high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Still in good condition
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this wallet for over a year now. And it’s still looks like new.
customer_reviews.author: Manny

customer_reviews.title: Bad packaging design ripped wallet interior edge
customer_reviews.text: The interior wallet packaging was such a bad design that when removing it, part of the wallet tore off. I super glued it back so it looks fine and not worth the effort of returning it, but for the brand and cost, would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: a.m.

customer_reviews.title: Look Elsewhere!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wallet because I like Tommy Hilfiger. However, I must say that this is one of the worst wallets I have ever owned; and I have had many in the last four decades. It has a cheap plastic feel to it, and comes apart. I would suggest you look elsewhere. Personally I believe that Carthartt has some of the best products on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Mathew Torres

customer_reviews.title: Yessir
customer_reviews.text: Card slots are bigger then normal which is great and the red is a little darker then seen(which I like the darker more) hard to close wallet with more than 15 bills in there
customer_reviews.author: jacob

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good wallet to have it is comfortable and and he a good texture I been having this wallet for about 5 months by now and it’s still is good.
customer_reviews.author: ezequiel

customer_reviews.title: Wallet
customer_reviews.text: I love the wallet it’s absolutely amazing , the packeting was terrific, but the only thing that a saw that was “bad” was that their was a dead spider under the wallet. But overall it’s a great product and I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Erika rhead

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet
customer_reviews.text: Great wallet. The leather seems to be really good. I am using it for a month and still looks like new. A lot of rooms for your card, and the passcase is awesome as you can just take your ID and two/three credit card when you don't want to carry your entire wallet. And this wallet comes in a really nice leather case.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: Been using this wallet for almost a year now and it is very durable. Keeps plenty of cards and cash. The stitching is very strong on this and the leather is very durable. I have had no problems with it still holds up like when I first bought it almost a year later.
customer_reviews.author: Stefan

customer_reviews.title: Mass produced wallet with flaws.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my Guess wallet that I have had for 15+ years, being the same size I thought I would like it. It's OK but not quality is not up to par, The leather is pretty thin and the slots to put your money in is horrible. I have to pry the slots apart to either take money out or put in. Overall it's cheaply made and I would look elsewhere for a better wallet.
customer_reviews.author: DJ_TY_KO

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very well made - the stitching is carefully done and overall it seems like the wallet will last through a great deal of use. (Remains to be seen how the wallet holds up after a year of normal use but based on the overall quality it seems like the wallet will last at least as well as my previous dockers wallet). Can remove the id card insert if you want an even slimmer billfold.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as part of a Father's Day gift for my husband. I absolutely loved it. The material was a great quality, it has a lot of storage space and it looked very pretty. Unfortunately he didn't bit was too big for his liking. Once he started switching his cards over he just stopped and said "it's not going to work out". Just because he's used to small wallets and this one became too bulky and it didn't close properly. I gave it to my father and he absolutely loved it.
customer_reviews.author: k.castillo

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with this wallet
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this wallet. I don't believe in spending too much money on something to hold money, which is kind of ridiculous to some people because it's a 20 dollar wallet. But what can I say, I'm just frugal/ really cheap :) I was deciding between this and a 10 dollar wallet at zara. Glad I bought this, got it in the mail today and absolutely love the quality. Hands down my favorite wallet I have purchased. I feel like a baller.
customer_reviews.author: Mick N

customer_reviews.title: A good gift for ur partner
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing purchase. It really looks changed chic and classic.
customer_reviews.author: Rashmi M.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it
customer_reviews.text: Returned it after received. The exterior of the wallet looks fine, but the interior already peels off at quite a few places when arrived. In fact I read similar reviews even before placed my order. However considering the 4+ stars (and the low price then) I decided to give it a try, which turned out to be a mistake. Just don't buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Best wallet yet. I'm 80
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about it, especially the plastic card holders.
customer_reviews.author: Frank H. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Well made, there is no better value
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy when I received this wallet, I was looking for one under $25 and this caught my eye. Its well constructed and fits everything you would need in a wallet, will say the cards fit a little snug but should loosen up over time. It came with a nice box with a price tag marked $44 nice to know I could purchase on Amazon for $18 vs the high department store price. I hope to enjoy years of use and I don't see any other better value for your money.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. We have a college age son who only wanted cash for Christmas. So I put cash inside this wallet. The wallet is high quality and our son loves it. I would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeoud
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend loves it. It’s extremely good quality and perfectly compact. Only problem was I ordered blue and got black
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Lowe

customer_reviews.title: good quality Price may be excellent for customers inside the ...
customer_reviews.text: good quality Price may be excellent for customers inside the U.S But you must take into account that some customers like me (contracted with a company to receive my Collectibles then sent to my country and they account me by weight) sometimes the price is like, or close to, in our local markets. FREE or Nominal amount international ship are a good solution
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed A.

product_meta.title: Tommy Hilfiger Men's Leather Wallet - Thin Sleek Casual Bifold with 6 Credit Card Pockets and Removable ID Window, Navy Cambridge
product_meta.description: As one of the world's leading premium lifestyle brands, Tommy Hilfiger delivers superior styling, quality and value to consumers worldwide. The brand celebrates the essence of classic American cool and provides a refreshing twist to classic, American fashion. This passcase Cambridge wallet features 8 slots compartments. Giving you enough space to keep all your belonging neat and organize. Storage Capacity:  4 credit card slots for your debit and credit cards, subway card or ID card  1 removable clear ID window with a thumb slider. Perfect to keep your working badge at your fingertips and remove it for the weekend  2 slip pockets for more business cards, coupons, receipt and notes  1 large bill compartment with bill divider to keep your bills organized Slim Design: Measuring just 3 ¾” x 4 ½”, our Tommy Hilfiger passcase wallet is perfect to fit in the back pocket of your jeans, pant or interior pocket of your vest. High quality genuine leather: At Tommy Hilfiger we only source best in class material to use when crafting our men’s wallet. We are dedicated to make wallets that will last for a long time. Our wallet features a soft-touch leather.
feature_bullets: 100% GENUINE LEATHER: Tommy Hilfiger only provides you with best in class quality material for your accessories - We pay a very close attention to the material we use in each product - Avoid the worn-out look thanks to the high-quality of this wallet

EXTRA CAPACITY WALLET: This passcase wallet features 4 card slots, 3 slip pockets and 1 large bill compartment with bill divider - It also features 1 removable ID window with a thumbhole, making it perfect to keep your work badge at your fingertips

TIMELESS DESIGN: You can never go wrong with this Tommy Hilfiger passcase wallet - The classic and modern design of its silhouette makes it a must-have for every man - The contrast stitching and logo patch inset on front add the elevated touch of style

SLIM DOWN YOUR POCKET: This slim fold wallet will perfectly fit in your pocket - Either you want to carry it with the removable ID window or not, you are ensured to always find space in your back pocket for your wallet

GIFT YOUR LOVED ONE: Thanksgiving and Christmas are approaching, or maybe a birthday is around the corner? Whatever the reason, a Tommy Hilfiger wallet is always a good idea. This Tommy Hilfiger wallet come with a giftable valet tray
